boardgame.name: Fields of Despair: France 1914-1918
boardgame.description: Fields of Despair: France 1914-1918 is a 2-player hex-based strategic level block war game set on the Western Front of the First World War. Players take control of the Allies or Central Powers fighting the war on land, at sea, and in the air all the while making tough economic and technological decisions at home._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Fields of Despair has a unique block system designed to maintain the fog of war throughout the entire game. In most games, block combat values range from one to four. In Fields of Despair the range is zero to twenty._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The range in values makes Fields of Despair a very deceptive game. Players can build up a large force with a single block instead of giving away their strategy with a stack of blocks._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Movement is simple and free flowing. Players are allowed to _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ldquo;make change_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo; during the movement phase. Thus a block with a combat value of 16 could be broken in two blocks of 8 before moving, or conversely two blocks could be combined into one. Zero-value blocks known as _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ldquo;Deception_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo; blocks could also be part of the exchange. Thus after every movement phase you never really know the strength of your enemy._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The fog of war isn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;t lost after first contact with the enemy. Blocks remain hidden even when enemies occupy the same hex and stay hidden until one player decides to allocate an air squadron for reconnaissance or sends his men across no man_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s land._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Components:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;1 Mounted Board 22_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; x 34_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;1 Rule Book_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;1 Playbook of Scenarios and Examples of Play_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;2 Player Boards (to track Econ and Tech)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;140 Blocks and Stickers_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- 48 Black_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- 49 Light Blue_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- 30 Tan_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- 10 Olive_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- 3 Orange_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;240 Counters_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- 162 5/8_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo; Counters (+14 blanks)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- 18 1/2_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; Counters_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- 60 1_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo; Counters (Air, Artillery, Tanks)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;74 1/4_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo; wood cubes (Economic Points)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- 30 Blue (Allied Naval/Production)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- 30 Black (CP Naval/Production)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- 12 Red (Eastern Front)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- 2 White (Naval, no effect)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;2 Bags for drawing Naval War and Eastern Front chits/cubes_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Various Player Aids (Solo _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; 2-Player)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

THIS IS A PREORDER - ESTIMATED DATE OF DELIVERY: LAST WEEK OF FEBRUARY 2017, save Your copy now! DIES IST EINE VORBESTELLUNG - VORAUSSICHTLICHER LIEFERTERMIN: LETZTE FEBRUARWOCHE, sicher Dir jetzt Dein Exemplar! Shipping costs / Versandkosten: Germany: 5,00 € EU Countries: 10,00 € Rest of the World: We send You a mail with the shipping costs All games are new and in their original wrapping and all prices include the German VAT (7% or 19%). We offer only goods that we have in stock, You can also visit our onlineshop www.gamers-hq.de for more games We ship worldwide – please ask for a quote about exact shipping costs (rest assured that we always try to keep them as low as possible). Payment may be made by Paypal (no extra fee) or bank transfer in advance. If you have any questions, feel free to send us an email (laden@gamers-hq.de), give us a call (+49 30 79706126) or visit our homepage (www.gamers-hq.de). If You´re a German buyer, just read the text below (“…innerhalb Deutschlands gilt:..”) Our Terms and Conditions 1. General All transactions between Gamers HQ and you, the customer, are subject to the following conditions, which you acknowledge by accepting delivery of your ordered products. These conditions do not affect your statutory rights and in all cases German law applies. 2. Orders and prices We do our level best to ensure that the information on our website is up-to-date. Please note that offers and prices are subject to change. We work to ensure that our prices are all correct, but cannot be held responsible for accidentally displaying the wrong price of a product. All prices are quoted in Euros and already include all necessary taxes. 3. Lead times and delivery costs Our products are delivered directly from our Berlin base, and orders are usually dispatched within two working days. Dispatch and transport are at the expense of the customer. We usually ship orders with DHL but explicitly reserve the right to choose another method of transport. If an order is split into several deliveries, each delivery counts as a separate transaction. Delivery within Germany is free of charge if your order amounts to a total of 50 euros or more. Below that amount, we charge a one-off fee of 5 euros. Our products can also be ordered for delivery outside Germany. In that case, an estimate of the delivery costs is added to your order during checkout. Please note that this delivery cost estimate does not necessarily constitute the final amount. We shall contact you personally by email after you have placed your order to present you with delivery options and to quote the final price for delivery costs. 4. Payment options We currently offer the following three payment options: direct debit from your bank account (only within Germany), bank transfer (prepayment) and PayPal. Once you have placed three orders, we also offer you the option to pay by invoice. Such privileges can, however, be withdrawn should we encounter repeated delays in settling invoices. 5. Cancellations, Refunds _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Returns Should you wish to cancel your order, you can do so by notifying us by fax, email, letter or by simply returning your product(s) to Gamers HQ. No questions asked. Please note that such a cancellation has to be done within two weeks after having received your ordered product(s). Should you have already paid for your order, we shall refund those costs to you as soon as we have received your cancellation notification. Please ensure that any products returned are in good condition. If you check the products in a manner that you will have done, for example, in a shop, this is fine. Any other handling of the product(s) might entitle Gamers HQ to some compensation from you, which might in rare cases amount to the original sum paid for the product(s). So should you feel that you might cancel your order by returning the products, please limit your inspection of the products to optical checks and do not use them on a regular basis. If you return your order within two weeks in the above manner, we shall refund you the costs for sending the product(s) back to us (unless your cancelled order amounts less than 20 euros, in which case you as the customer will bear the cost of return postage). Please ensure that you use appropriate packing material when sending back the product(s) — preferably using the original wrapping. Please note that German law, following the EU directive 97/7/EG of 20 May 1997, specifies that the right to return items and receive a full refund is not applicable to the purchase of newspapers, magazines or journals (§312d BGB) as well as the purchase of audio- or video-recordings and software once you have broken the seal of the package. Should we accidently send you the wrong products, please return them to us and we shall refund you the return postage immediately. Any cancellation of an order has to be done in writing (by post, fax or email). 6. Ownership Please note that ordered products remain our property until you have fully paid for them. 7. Personal data We are committed to protecting your personal information and will keep the information you entrust to us safely and securely. We may collect information from you to monitor website visitor patterns, so that we can improve our website. We also collect information from you to handle orders, deliver products and services, process payments, communicate with you about orders, products and services, update our records and generally maintain your customer profile with us. However, we shall never sell or share your personal information with third parties. Our customer data — in so far as required to provide the above services and within the limits defined by the data protection laws of Germany (paragraph 26 BDSG) — is saved and handled on a separate, network-independent computer. 8. Other matters We reserve the right to reject orders without any explanation. Also please note that you as a customer cannot assert a claim against Gamers HQ if, for whatever reason, we are unable to source the item(s) you have ordered. Such cases arise only very exceptionally; we try to ensure that everything we advertise in our web shop is in stock. Where, for whatever reason, we are unable to deliver we promptly refund in full everything you have paid. 9. Limitation of liability: external links Although we check the content of external links provided on our website, we have no control over or responsibility for these domains to which we provide the links or which link to us. That responsibility solely rests with those who manage the respective domains. 10. Place of jurisdiction Any disputes arising hereunder will be settled before a Berlin court. We reserve the right to choose the customer_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s place of jurisdiction instead. 11. Severability clause If parts of these terms and conditions become ineffective, the remainder of these terms still apply. Bezahlt werden kann per paypal, Vorauskasse, Bankeinzug oder direkt bei uns im Laden (wenn ihr aus Berlin kommt). Allgemeines Alle Transaktionen zwischen dem Gamers HQ und seinen Kunden unterliegen ausschließlich den nachfolgenden Allgemeinen Geschäftsbedingungen und basieren auf der Grundlage des Rechts der Bundesrepublik Deutschland. Diese AGB gelten mit der Annahme der Sendung des Gamers-HQ als anerkannt. 2. Auftragsannahme und Preise Alle Angebote und Preise sind freibleibend; Liefermöglichkeit vorbehalten. Preisänderungen, auch ohne Ankündigung, oder Irrtümer sind jederzeit vorbehalten. Alle Preisangaben sind in Euro und inklusive der gesetzlichen Mehrwertsteuer. 3. Lieferung Alle Lieferungen erfolgen ab dem Gamers-HQ. Alle Lieferungen erfolgen auf Rechnung des Käufers. In der Regel liefern wir mit DHL, in besonderen Fällen kann davon abgewichen werden. Die Entscheidung hierüber liegt beim Gamer´s HQ. Alle Bestellung werden normalerweise innerhalb von 2 Werktagen verschickt. Teillieferungen gelten als jeweils separates Geschäft. Der Versand erfolgt ab einem Rechnungsbetrag von Euro 50,- € innerhalb Deutschlands versandkostenfrei. Bei Bestellungen unter diesem Betrag erheben wir innerhalb Deutschlands eine Versandkostengebühr von Euro 5,-€. 4. Zahlungsbedingungen Wir bieten standartmäßig 3 Möglichkeiten der Bezahlung an: Per Bankeinzug, Vorkasse oder per PayPal .Nach der dritten Bestellung räumen wir unseren Kunden auch die Möglichkeit des Kaufs auf Rechnung ein, wir sind jedoch befugt, diese Möglichkeit bei mehrmaligem Zahlungsverzug auch wieder zu widerrufen. 5. Rückgaberecht Sie können ohne Angabe von Gründen durch Erklärung per Fax, E-Mail oder einfaches Briefschreiben oder durch Rücksendung unserer Waren eine Bestellung widerrufen. Für die Absendung der Widerrufserklärung oder unserer Waren ist eine Widerrufsfrist von zwei Wochen einzuhalten, die mit Eingang unserer Lieferung bei Ihnen beginnt. Ein Widerrufsrecht steht Ihnen - auch innerhalb der Widerrufsfrist - in keinem Fall bei folgenden Waren zu: - Audio- oder Videoaufzeichnungen bzw. Software, wenn Sie die entsprechenden Datenträger entsiegelt haben, - Zeitungen, Zeitschriften und Illustrierten. Unsere Ware ist sofort nach der fristgerechten Ausübung des Widerrufsrechts auf unsere Kosten und Gefahr an uns zurückzusenden, wenn der Widerruf nicht bereits durch Rücksendung ausgeübt wurde. Achten Sie bitte bei der Rücksendung darauf, dass Sie eine geeignete Verpackung benutzen, vorzugsweise die Originalverpackung. Ausnahmsweise sind die Kosten der Rücksendung von Ihnen zu tragen, wenn der Rechnungswert unserer Ware nicht mehr als Euro 20,00 beträgt. In keinem Fall haben Sie die Kosten der Rücksendung zu tragen, wenn die von uns gelieferte Ware nicht der bestellten Ware entspricht. Sollten Sie bereits den Kaufpreis für die Ware bezahlt haben, werden wir diesen nach einem Widerruf unverzüglich zurückerstatten. Wenn Sie unsere Ware nach dem Widerruf ganz oder teilweise nicht oder nur in verschlechtertem Zustand zurücksenden, sind Sie uns gesetzlich zu Wertersatz verpflichtet. Das gilt nicht, soweit Sie unsere Ware lediglich so geprüft haben, wie Sie es z.B. im Ladengeschäft hätten tun können. Jede darüber hinausgehende Nutzung der Ware berechtigt uns jedoch zu Ersatzansprüchen, die unter Umständen die Höhe des Kaufpreises erreichen können. Sollten Sie also einen Widerruf in Betracht ziehen, beschränken Sie sich möglichst auf eine optische Prüfung und nehmen Sie die Ware nicht regulär in Gebrauch. 6. Eigentumsvorbehalt Gelieferte Artikel bleiben bis zur vollständigen Bezahlung Eigentum der Firma Gamers-HQ. 7. Datenspeicherung Unsere Kundendaten – soweit geschäftsnotwendig und im Rahmen des Bundesdatenschutzgesetzes (Paragraph 26 BDSG) zulässig – werden EDV-mäßig gespeichert und verarbeitet (auf einem netzexternen Rechner). Kundendaten werden unter keinen Umständen Dritten zur Verfügung gestellt. 8. Sonstiges Die Ablehnung von Aufträgen, auch ohne Angaben von Gründen, behalten wir uns ausdrücklich vor. Aus Lieferschwierigkeiten unsererseits erwachsen keinerlei Ansprüche gegen das Gamers-HQ. Können Bestellungen aus irgendwelchen Gründen nicht ausgeführt werden, werden bereits geleistete Zahlungen umgehend zurückerstattet. 9. Haftungshinweis Trotz sorgfältiger inhaltlicher Kontrolle übernehmen wir keine Haftung für die Inhalte externer Links. Für den Inhalt der verlinkten Seiten sind ausschließlich deren Betreiber verantwortlich. 10. Gerichtsstand Erfüllungsort und Gerichtsstand ist für beide Teile Berlin. Nach unserer Wahl kann auch am allgemeinen Gerichtsstand des Kunden geklagt werden. 11. Salvatorische Klausel Die Unwirksamkeit einzelner Bestimmungen berührt die Gültigkeit der Geschäftsbedingungen im übrigen nicht.

All prices are quoted in Euros and already include all necessary taxes. 3. Lead times and delivery costs Our products are delivered directly from our Berlin base, and orders are usually dispatched within two working days. Dispatch and transport are at the expense of the customer. We usually ship orders with DHL but explicitly reserve the right to choose another method of transport. If an order is split into several deliveries, each delivery counts as a separate transaction. Delivery within Germany is free of charge if your order amounts to a total of 50 euros or more. Below that amount, we charge a one-off fee of 5 euros. Our products can also be ordered for delivery outside Germany. In that case, an estimate of the delivery costs is added to your order during checkout. Please note that this delivery cost estimate does not necessarily constitute the final amount. We shall contact you personally by email after you have placed your order to present you with delivery options and to quote the final price for delivery costs. 4. Payment options We currently offer the following three payment options: direct debit from your bank account (only within Germany), bank transfer (prepayment) and PayPal. No questions asked. Please note that such a cancellation has to be done within two weeks after having received your ordered product(s). Should you have already paid for your order, we shall refund those costs to you as soon as we have received your cancellation notification. Please ensure that any products returned are in good condition. If you check the products in a manner that you will have done, for example, in a shop, this is fine. Any other handling of the product(s) might entitle Gamers HQ to some compensation from you, which might in rare cases amount to the original sum paid for the product(s). So should you feel that you might cancel your order by returning the products, please limit your inspection of the products to optical checks and do not use them on a regular basis. If you return your order within two weeks in the above manner, we shall refund you the costs for sending the product(s) back to us (unless your cancelled order amounts less than 20 euros, in which case you as the customer will bear the cost of return postage). Please ensure that you use appropriate packing material when sending back the product(s) — preferably using the original wrapping. Please note that German law, following the EU directive 97/7/EG of 20 May 1997, specifies that the right to return items and receive a full refund is not applicable to the purchase of newspapers, magazines or journals (§312d BGB) as well as the purchase of audio- or video-recordings and software once you have broken the seal of the package. Should we accidently send you the wrong products, please return them to us and we shall refund you the return postage immediately. Any cancellation of an order has to be done in writing (by post, fax or email). 6. Ownership Please note that ordered products remain our property until you have fully paid for them. 7. Personal data We are committed to protecting your personal information and will keep the information you entrust to us safely and securely. We may collect information from you to monitor website visitor patterns, so that we can improve our website. We also collect information from you to handle orders, deliver products and services, process payments, communicate with you about orders, products and services, update our records and generally maintain your customer profile with us. However, we shall never sell or share your personal information with third parties. Our customer data — in so far as required to provide the above services and within the limits defined by the data protection laws of Germany (paragraph 26 BDSG) — is saved and handled on a separate, network-independent computer. 8. Other matters We reserve the right to reject orders without any explanation. Also please note that you as a customer cannot assert a claim against Gamers HQ if, for whatever reason, we are unable to source the item(s) you have ordered. Such cases arise only very exceptionally; we try to ensure that everything we advertise in our web shop is in stock. Where, for whatever reason, we are unable to deliver we promptly refund in full everything you have paid. 9. We reserve the right to choose the customer_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s place of jurisdiction instead. 11.
